doc.after: In the Christian Bible, the deities of other religions are sometimes interpreted or created as "demons" (from the Greek Old Testament Î´Î±Î¹Î¼ÏÎ½Î¹Î¿Î½ daimonion).[51] The evolution of the Christian Devil and pentagram are examples of early rituals and images that showcase evil qualities, as seen by the Christian churches.
